author: Special Correspondent
text:
DMK leader M. Karunanidhi on Wednesday said that saving democracy would be the main plank of election campaign.

Talking to press reporters at the Egmore railway station here on his return from Tiruvarur, Mr. Karunanidhi urged the Election Commission to look into the allegation that 40 lakh bogus voters had been included in the voters’ list.
title: ‘Save democracy’ is main poll plank, says Karunanidhi
